text: Ndipo Mose adasankha, pakati pa anthu ake, amuna makumi asanu ndi awiri kuti adzakumane nafe ndipo pamene nthaka idagwedezeka pamapazi pawo, Mose adati: “Chikadakhala chifuniro chanu, Ambuye, mukadawaononga iwo ndi ine kale. Kodi inu mungationonge chifukwa cha ntchito za anthu amene ali pakati pathu? Awa ndi mayesero anu, amene Inu mumasocheretsa aliyense amene mwamufuna ndi kutsogolera yemwe mwamufuna. Inu nokha ndinu Mtetezi wathu ndipo tichitireni chisoni chifukwa Inu ndinu wopambana onse amene amakhululukira.”
